name: hestia afghan square
notes:
finished size with worsted weight yarn and hook size 5 mm will be a 12 inch square.

if made with a sport weight yarn and hook size 4.5 mm as my square it will have 10.5 inch.

crochet level is intermediate/advanced beginners.

special thanks to my testers bankerlady and paulinasmith. you made a great and very helpful job. thank you so much.
